name: Cookie Clapper
description:
Put That Cookie Down! - Arnold Schwarzenegger

A very inspiring quote 💡! Unfortunately, you don't listen 😤! See how many times you can clap 👏 the cookie 🍪 by clicking 🖱️before Mr. Schwarzenegger forces you to put it down ☹️ after 1 minute.

MIT licensed, free and open source! https://github.com/AlnisS/cookieclapper

Inspired by this video:
